45enum ControlKnobs

48 KNOB_REFLECT,
49 KNOB_MIX,

51 KNOB_BLUR,
52 KNOB_WARP,
53 KNOB_LAST,
54};

99enum Leds
100{
101 LED_REVERSE,
102 LED_FREEZE,
103 LED_1,
104 LED_2,
105 LED_3,
106 LED_4,
107 LED_5,
108 LED_6,
109 LED_BOT_1,
110 LED_BOT_2,
111 LED_BOT_3,
112 LED_LAST,
113};
114
119struct CalibrationData
120{
121 CalibrationData() : warp_scale(60.f), warp_offset(0.f), cv_offset{0.f} {}
122 float warp_scale, warp_offset;
123 float cv_offset[CV_LAST];
124
126 bool operator==(const CalibrationData &rhs)
127 {
128 if(warp_scale != rhs.warp_scale)
129 {
130 return false;
131 }
132 else if(warp_offset != rhs.warp_offset)
133 {
134 return false;
135 }
136 else
137 {
138 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
139 {
140 if(cv_offset[i] != rhs.cv_offset[i])
141 return false;
142 }
143 }
144 return true;
145 }
146
148 bool operator!=(const CalibrationData &rhs) { return !operator==(rhs); }
149};
150
158class Hardware
159{
160 public:
164 Hardware() {}
165
169 ~Hardware() {}
170
178 void Init(bool boost = true)
179 {
180 seed.Init(boost);
181 hw_version = GetBoardRevision();
182 ConfigureAudio();
183 ConfigureControls();
184 ConfigureLeds();
185 seed.adc.Start();
186 SetAudioSampleRate(daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ);
187 SetAudioBlockSize(96);
188 UpdateHidRates();
189
190 LoadCalibrationData();
191 cal_save_flag_ = false;
192 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
193 {
194 cv_offsets_[i] = 0.f;
195 }
196 }
197
203 void DelayMs(size_t del) { seed.DelayMs(del); }
204
213 void StartLowPriorityCallback(daisy::TimerHandle::PeriodElapsedCallback cb,
214 uint32_t target_freq,
215 void *data = nullptr)
216 {
217 daisy::TimerHandle::Config timcfg;
218 timcfg.periph = daisy::TimerHandle::Config::Peripheral::TIM_5;
219 timcfg.dir = daisy::TimerHandle::Config::CounterDir::UP;
220 auto tim_base_freq = daisy::System::GetPClk2Freq();
221 auto tim_target_freq = target_freq;
222 auto tim_period = tim_base_freq / tim_target_freq;
223 timcfg.period = tim_period;
224 timcfg.enable_irq = true;
225 tim5_handle.Init(timcfg);
226 tim5_handle.SetCallback(cb, data);
228 tim5_handle.Start();
229 }
230
232 void StartAudio(daisy::AudioHandle::InterleavingAudioCallback cb)
233 {
234 seed.StartAudio(cb);
235 }
236
241 void StartAudio(daisy::AudioHandle::AudioCallback cb)
242 {
243 current_cb_ = cb;
244 seed.StartAudio(cb);
245 }
246
248 void ChangeAudioCallback(daisy::AudioHandle::InterleavingAudioCallback cb)
249 {
250 seed.ChangeAudioCallback(cb);
251 }
252
253
255 void ChangeAudioCallback(daisy::AudioHandle::AudioCallback cb)
256 {
257 current_cb_ = cb;
258 seed.ChangeAudioCallback(cb);
259 }
260
267 void ChangeSampleRate(int sr)
268 {
269 daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate srval;
270 size_t new_blocksize = 96;
271 switch(sr)
272 {
273 case 16000:
274 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_16KHZ;
275 break;
276 case 32000:
277 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_32KHZ;
278 break;
279 case 48000:
280 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
281 break;
282 case 96000:
283 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_96KHZ;
284 new_blocksize = 48;
285 break;
286 default:
287 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
288 break;
289 }
290 seed.StopAudio();
291 seed.SetAudioSampleRate(srval);
292 seed.SetAudioBlockSize(new_blocksize);
293 seed.StartAudio(current_cb_);
294 }
295
297 void StopAudio() { seed.StopAudio(); }
298
302 void SetAudioSampleRate(daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate samplerate)
303 {
304 seed.SetAudioSampleRate(samplerate);
305 }
306
311 void SetAudioSampleRate(int samplerate)
312 {
313 daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate srval;
314 switch(samplerate)
315 {
316 case 16000:
317 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_16KHZ;
318 break;
319 case 32000:
320 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_32KHZ;
321 break;
322 case 48000:
323 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
324 break;
325 case 96000:
326 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_96KHZ;
327 break;
328 default:
329 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
330 break;
331 }
332 seed.SetAudioSampleRate(srval);
333 }
334
336 float AudioSampleRate() { return seed.audio_handle.GetSampleRate(); }
337
339 void SetAudioBlockSize(size_t blocksize)
340 {
341 seed.SetAudioBlockSize(blocksize);
342 }
343
345 size_t AudioBlockSize() { return seed.AudioBlockSize(); }

348 float AudioCallbackRate() const { return seed.AudioCallbackRate(); }
349
351 void SetTestLed(bool state) { seed.SetLed(state); }
352
358 void ClearLeds()
359 {
360 for(int i = 0; i < LED_LAST; i++)
361 {
362 SetLed((Leds)i, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
363 }
364 }
365
371 void WriteLeds() { led_driver_.SwapBuffersAndTransmit(); }
372
379 void SetLed(Leds idx, float r, float g, float b)
380 {
381 LedIdx led = LedMap[idx];
382 if(led.r != -1)
383 led_driver_.SetLed(led.r, r);
384 led_driver_.SetLed(led.g, g);
385 led_driver_.SetLed(led.b, b);
386 }
387
391 void ProcessAllControls()
392 {
393 ProcessAnalogControls();
394 ProcessDigitalControls();
395 }
396
400 void ProcessDigitalControls()
401 {
402 for(int i = 0; i < SW_LAST; i++)
403 {
404 switches[i].Debounce();
405 }
406 }
407
411 void ProcessAnalogControls()
412 {
413 for(int i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
414 {
415 controls[i].Process();
416 }
417
418 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
419 {
420 cv[i].Process();
421 }
422 }
426 inline float GetKnobValue(int ctrl) const { return controls[ctrl].Value(); }
427
433 inline const daisy::Switch &GetButton(int idx) const
434 {
435 return switches[idx];
436 }
437
443 inline bool GetGateTrig(int idx) { return gates[idx].Trig(); }
444
448 inline bool GetGateState(int idx) { return gates[idx].State(); }
449
451 void UpdateHidRates()
452 {
453 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
454 {
455 cv[i].SetSampleRate(AudioCallbackRate());
456 }
457 for(int i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
458 {
459 controls[i].SetSampleRate(AudioCallbackRate());
460 }
461 for(int i = 0; i < SW_LAST; i++)
462 {
463 switches[i].SetUpdateRate(AudioCallbackRate());
464 }
465 }
466
468 void PrepareMedia(
469 daisy::USBHostHandle::ConnectCallback connect_cb = nullptr,
470 daisy::USBHostHandle::DisconnectCallback disconnect_cb = nullptr,
471 daisy::USBHostHandle::ClassActiveCallback class_active_cb = nullptr,
472 daisy::USBHostHandle::ErrorCallback error_cb = nullptr,
473 void *userdata = nullptr)
474 {
476 daisy::USBHostHandle::Config usbcfg;
477 usbcfg.connect_callback = connect_cb;
478 usbcfg.disconnect_callback = disconnect_cb;
479 usbcfg.class_active_callback = class_active_cb;
480 usbcfg.error_callback = error_cb;
481 usbcfg.userdata = userdata;
482 usb.Init(usbcfg);
483
485 daisy::FatFSInterface::Config fsi_cfg;
486 fsi_cfg.media = daisy::FatFSInterface::Config::MEDIA_USB;
487 fatfs_interface.Init(fsi_cfg);
488 f_mount(&fatfs_interface.GetUSBFileSystem(),
489 fatfs_interface.GetUSBPath(),
490 0);
491 }
492
496 inline float GetWarpVoct()
497 {
498 return voct_cal.ProcessInput(cv[CV_WARP].Value());
499 }
500
507 inline float GetCvValue(int cv_idx)
508 {
509 if(cv_idx != CV_WARP)
510 return cv[cv_idx].Value() - cv_offsets_[cv_idx];
511 else
512 return cv[cv_idx].Value();
513 }
514
516 inline void CalibrateV1(float v1) { warp_v1_ = v1; }
517
521 inline void CalibrateV3(float v3)
522 {
523 warp_v3_ = v3;
524 voct_cal.Record(warp_v1_, warp_v3_);
525 cal_save_flag_ = true;
526 }
527
531 inline void SetWarpCalData(float scale, float offset)
532 {
533 voct_cal.SetData(scale, offset);
534 }
535
539 inline void GetWarpCalData(float &scale, float &offset)
540 {
541 voct_cal.GetData(scale, offset);
542 }
543
545 inline void SetCvOffsetData(float *data)
546 {
547 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
548 {
549 cv_offsets_[i] = data[i];
550 }
551 }
552
554 inline void GetCvOffsetData(float *data)
555 {
556 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
557 {
558 data[i] = cv_offsets_[i];
559 }
560 }
561
563 inline bool ReadyToSaveCal() const { return cal_save_flag_; }
564
566 inline void ClearSaveCalFlag() { cal_save_flag_ = false; }

581 daisy::DaisySeed seed;

589 static constexpr uint32_t kCalibrationDataOffset = 4096;

592 struct LedIdx
593 {
594 int8_t r;
595 int8_t g;
596 int8_t b;
597 };
598
600 const LedIdx LedMap[LED_LAST] = {{0, 1, 2},
601 {3, 4, 5},
602 {6, 7, 8},
603 {9, 10, 11},
604 {16, 17, 18},
605 {12, 13, 14},
606 {22, 23, 24},
607 {28, 29, 30},
608 {-1, 20, 21},
609 {-1, 26, 27},
610 {-1, 19, 25}};

613 enum class HardwareVersion
614 {
615 REV3,
616 REV4,
617 };
618
619
621 daisy::LedDriverPca9685<2, true> led_driver_;
622
624 daisy::AudioHandle::AudioCallback current_cb_;
625
626 daisy::TimerHandle tim5_handle;
627 daisy::I2CHandle i2c;
628 daisy::Pcm3060 codec;
629
630 HardwareVersion hw_version;

634 daisy::VoctCalibration voct_cal;

639
640 void ConfigureAudio()
641 {
643 if(hw_version == HardwareVersion::REV3)
644 {
645 daisy::I2CHandle::Config codec_i2c_config;
646 codec_i2c_config.periph
647 = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Peripheral::I2C_1;
648 codec_i2c_config.pin_config = {seed.GetPin(11), seed.GetPin(12)};
649 codec_i2c_config.speed
650 = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Speed::I2C_400KHZ;
651 codec_i2c_config.mode = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Mode::I2C_MASTER;
652
653 i2c.Init(codec_i2c_config);
654 codec.Init(i2c);
655
656 daisy::SaiHandle::Config sai_cfg;
657 sai_cfg.periph = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Peripheral::SAI_2;
658 sai_cfg.sr = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
659 sai_cfg.bit_depth = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::BitDepth::SAI_24BIT;
660 sai_cfg.a_sync = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Sync::SLAVE;
661 sai_cfg.b_sync = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Sync::MASTER;
662 sai_cfg.a_dir = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Direction::RECEIVE;
663 sai_cfg.b_dir = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Direction::TRANSMIT;
664 sai_cfg.pin_config.fs = seed.GetPin(27);
665 sai_cfg.pin_config.mclk = seed.GetPin(24);
666 sai_cfg.pin_config.sck = seed.GetPin(28);
667 sai_cfg.pin_config.sa = seed.GetPin(26);
668 sai_cfg.pin_config.sb = seed.GetPin(25);
669 // Then Initialize
670 daisy::SaiHandle sai_2_handle;
671 sai_2_handle.Init(sai_cfg);
672 daisy::AudioHandle::Config audio_cfg;
673 audio_cfg.blocksize = 48;
674 audio_cfg.samplerate
675 = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
676 audio_cfg.postgain = 1.0f;
677 seed.audio_handle.Init(audio_cfg, sai_2_handle);
678 }
679 else
680 {
682 daisy::GPIO deemp;
683 daisy::Pin deemp_pin(daisy::PORTB, 11);
684 deemp.Init(deemp_pin, daisy::GPIO::Mode::OUTPUT);
685 deemp.Write(0);
686 }
687 }
688
689 // pots,switches, gates, CV
690 void ConfigureControls()
691 {
692 if(hw_version == HardwareVersion::REV3)
693 {
694 // ===== CV and Pots (adc) =====
695 daisy::AdcChannelConfig cfg[CV_LAST + 1];
696
697 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
698 {
699 cfg[i].InitSingle(seed.GetPin(17 + i));
700 }
701 cfg[CV_LAST].InitMux(seed.GetPin(16),
702 6,
703 seed.GetPin(7),
704 seed.GetPin(8),
705 seed.GetPin(9));
706 seed.adc.Init(cfg, CV_LAST + 1);
707
708 // init cv as bipolar analog controls
709 for(size_t i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
710 {
711 cv[i].InitBipolarCv(seed.adc.GetPtr(i), AudioCallbackRate());
712 }
713
714 // init pots as analog controls
715 for(size_t i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
716 {
717 controls[i].Init(seed.adc.GetMuxPtr(CV_LAST, i),
718 AudioCallbackRate());
719 }
720
721 // ===== gates =====
722 dsy_gpio_pin pin;
723 pin = seed.GetPin(23);
724 gates[GATE_FREEZE].Init(&pin);
725 }
726 else
727 {
729 daisy::AdcChannelConfig cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_LAST];
731 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_TIME].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A0);
732 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_REFLECT].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A1);
733 cfg[CV_ATMOSPHERE].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A2);
734 cfg[CV_TIME].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A3);
735 cfg[CV_MIX].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A4);
736 cfg[CV_REFLECT].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A5);
737 cfg[CV_BLUR].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A6);
738 cfg[CV_WARP].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A7);
739 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_MIX].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A8);
740 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_WARP].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A9);
741 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_ATMOSPHERE].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A10);
742 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_BLUR].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A11);
743 seed.adc.Init(cfg, CV_LAST + KNOB_LAST);
744
745 for(size_t i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
746 {
747 cv[i].InitBipolarCv(seed.adc.GetPtr(i), AudioCallbackRate());
748 }
749 // init pots as analog controls with offset to last CV for ptr
750 for(size_t i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
751 {
752 controls[i].Init(seed.adc.GetPtr(CV_LAST + i),
753 AudioCallbackRate());
754 }
755 dsy_gpio_pin freeze_pin = daisy::seed::D26;
756 gates[GATE_FREEZE].Init(&freeze_pin);
757 }
758 // And anything generic to both versions
759 // ===== switches =====
760 switches[SW_FREEZE].Init(seed.GetPin(1), AudioCallbackRate());
761 switches[SW_REVERSE].Init(seed.GetPin(10), AudioCallbackRate());
762 switches[SW_SHIFT].Init(seed.GetPin(13), AudioCallbackRate());
763
764 dsy_gpio_pin revpin = seed.GetPin(14);
765 gates[GATE_REVERSE].Init(&revpin);
766 }
767
768 void ConfigureLeds()
769 {
770 // reinit i2c at 1MHz
771 daisy::I2CHandle::Config codec_i2c_config;
772 codec_i2c_config.periph = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Peripheral::I2C_1;
773 codec_i2c_config.pin_config = {seed.GetPin(11), seed.GetPin(12)};
774 codec_i2c_config.speed = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Speed::I2C_1MHZ;
775 codec_i2c_config.mode = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Mode::I2C_MASTER;
776 i2c.Init(codec_i2c_config);
777
778 // init driver
779 led_driver_.Init(i2c, {0x00, 0x01}, led_dma_buffer_a, led_dma_buffer_b);
780
781 ClearLeds();
782 WriteLeds();
783 }
784
785 HardwareVersion GetBoardRevision()
786 {
787 daisy::GPIO version_gpio;
788 version_gpio.Init(daisy::seed::D2,
789 daisy::GPIO::Mode::INPUT,
790 daisy::GPIO::Pull::PULLUP);
792 auto pinstate = version_gpio.Read();
793 version_gpio.DeInit();
794 if(pinstate)
795 return HardwareVersion::REV3;
796 else
797 return HardwareVersion::REV4;
798 }
799
801 void LoadCalibrationData()
802 {
803 daisy::PersistentStorage<CalibrationData> cal_storage(seed.qspi);
804 CalibrationData default_cal;
805 cal_storage.Init(default_cal, kCalibrationDataOffset);
806 auto &cal_data = cal_storage.GetSettings();
807 SetWarpCalData(cal_data.warp_scale, cal_data.warp_offset);
808 SetCvOffsetData(cal_data.cv_offset);
809 }
810};
